Daily Bite #44

Deden Fathurahman — March 15, 2018
less than 1 minute read (77 words)

  • Moving Upstream – Wall Street Journal Season 1 of Moving Upstream, great episodes, especially cashless system in China.

  • Design Microsites – love chris’ write up about this, i especially love this repo from BloombergMedia called What is Code, yes, it’s a microsite.

  • Put people, not features, first – in designing product, put people first, feature sometimes overloaded, full with stuff that people don’t even need.
